snippet: The confidence we can get when modeling relatively simple things, like an N.F.L. game, can lead to overconfidence when applying the same techniques beyond sports.
abstract: The confidence we can get when modeling relatively simple things, like an N.F.L. game, can lead to overconfidence when applying the same techniques beyond sports.

headline.main: Week 10 N.F.L. Game Probabilities: Don't Be So Sure
